name: WIZ
description:
Select the spells that best fit the challenges you're facing. Need to recover your hearts in a though platforming area? Equip the Health Recover. Are you willing to stop the flow of time and jump on the arrows that are trying to kill you? Equip the Time control!

Features

  • A big connected world with a lot of secrets, power ups, enemies and bosses.
  • Spells, bottles, cloaks, rings! There's many upgrades that you'll get along your adventure.
  • Tight, fluid gameplay with responsive mechanics and spells.
  • Realtime lighting system and particles gives the game a modern punch.
  • Real challenge, the game is designed to be hard - not unfair.
  • A cute little dog that's your travel partner.

A solo developed Metroidvania made with love within each pixel.
WIZ - Lilith's Curse is planned to be released in 2022.
